title: Creativity-Centered Design and Technology Education Methodology for Elementary Students

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Instructional Design Theory and Understanding of Elementary Education Curriculum
context.additional_context: A project-based course for mathematics majors analyzing creativity mechanisms in elementary design and technology education through child-centered research methods.

learning_goals: Child-centered research methodologies can be utilized to analyze factors that foster creativity in elementary design and technology education.
Project-based assessments can present pedagogically structured educational designs for enhancing creativity in a mathematically organized manner.
Educational materials can be developed by effectively utilizing online LMS in small-group collaborative environments.

resources: Elementary Design and Technology Education Case Database
LMS Collaboration Tools (e.g., Padlet, Google Jamboard)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
